content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. I'm here to help you get your electrical problem resolved. Could I please get your name to get started?
Thanks, Josh! Could you please provide the address where you need the electrical service?
Great, thank you! That address is in our service area. Can you tell me a bit about the electrical issue you're experiencing?
Yeah, I’ve got a couple of outlets that just stopped working in my kitchen. I think it might be a wiring issue.
Thanks for the details, Josh. When would be a good time for one of our electricians to come take a look at your kitchen outlets?
Actually, I can’t schedule anything yet. I’m waiting to hear back from my insurance to see if they’ll cover this. Once I know, I’ll reach out.

No problem at all, Josh. Whenever you’re ready, just let us know and we’ll get you scheduled right away. If you have any other questions in the meantime, feel free to reach out. Hope your insurance comes through!
reason: Customer is waiting for insurance approval before scheduling.
